MWC.GUI

Class PlainChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.PlainChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, CanvasType.PaintListener, Pane
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AWTChart, SwingChart

    public abstract class PlainChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pane, CanvasType.PaintListener, java.io.Serializable, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    GUI-independent implemententation of a chart
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
